code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./Animal.css";import CategoriesNav from"../categoriesNav/categoriesNav";import{fetchData}from"../../Api/dataApi";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Animal=()=>{const{t}=useTranslation();const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchAnimals=async()=>{try{const result=await fetchData("Animals");setData(result);}catch(err){setError(err.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchAnimals();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Animal",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CategoriesNav,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"Animal-title",children:t("available_animals")}),loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:t("loading")}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{color:"red"},children:[t("error_message"),": ",error]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Animal-container",children:data.map(animal=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Animal-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(animal.id||animal._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Array.isArray(animal.images)&&animal.images.length>0?animal.images[0]:t("no_image"),alt:animal.title||t("no_name"),className:"Animal-image"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Animal-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"animal-name",children:animal.title||t("no_name")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"animal-description",children:animal.description||t("no_description")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"animal-price",children:[t("price"),": ",animal.price||t("no_price")]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"animal-location",children:[t("location"),": ",animal.location||t("no_location")]})]})]},animal.id||animal._id))})]});};export default Animal;
